title: India
subtle:
Informational (nonfiction), 1,480 words, Level Y (Grade 5), Lexile 1010L            
                        
		Multilevel Book also available in levels                     K and S
description: India will show students many interesting aspects of this country, including its fascinating people and their celebrations. From crowded cities to jungles and mangrove forests, students will enjoy learning about this unique country and its culture.
